roleset.name: likely (implies high probability)
roleset.note: PROBABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia while framing for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: probable-j
example.text: As reported by Marc J. Spears, [Kevin Durant]-1 is probable *PRO*-1 to play tonight against the Sixers.
example.arg: As reported by Marc J. Spears
*PRO*-1 to play tonight against the Sixers

roleset.name: statistical measurment of chance, could be high or low
roleset.note: PROBABILITY-N NOTES: Added by Julia while framing for clearearth-earthquakes.

role.descr: thing with a measurable chance of occurance

example.name: probability-n: concatenation
example.text: You can lookup any stock and see its probability to go up or down in the next few days.
example.arg: [its][to go up or down in the next few days]

example.name: probability-n
example.text: A residential farmer using the Site in the future would have a 1 in 3 probability of developing cancer.
